attributes.action: Restrict newly qualified drivers to cars not exceeding 1000cc for 2 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give them time to gain experience and limit deaths on the roads. RIGHT NAME, RIGHT ADDRESS AS YOU KNOW FULL WELL.

rejection.details: Two different names have been used for this email address. We need a correct full name and an address from within the UK or a UK-dependency.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
